title: Was Pilakwa, New York, abandoned by water-breaking?
subtitle: There is no city in Blackoa, New York, and it was a sad sign that it was abandoned by the cracking part of an art facility.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: There is a sign of the location of the town of Blackoa, New York, which has now been abandoned, and which is rendered uninhabitable by waterbreaking.
